name: Guess The Animal (hassan mtayrek)
description:
Guess The Animal is a puzzle game that contains more than 100 level, in each level a photo of an animal will pop out the user should guess the name of the animal and put it down in the empty space. 

If you find any difficulties in solving any level you can use coins to delete a letter, or to put the right letter in the right place, or you can watch an ad to complete the level.

There are two ways to get coins. First you can watch an ad and get extra coins, or by completing levels and get rewarded.

Enjoy the game.
